title: Ageable
description: Adds a timer for the entity to grow up. It can be accelerated by giving the entity the items it likes as defined by feedItems.

drop_items.description: List of items that the entity drops when it grows up.
drop_items.title: Drop Items

duration.description: Amount of time before the entity grows up, -1 for always a baby.
duration.title: Duration

feed_items.description: List of items that can be fed to the entity. Includes `item` for the item name and `growth` to define how much time it grows up by

result_item.title: Result Item
result_item.description: The feed item used will transform to this item upon successful interaction. Format: itemName:auxValue

feed_items.title: Feed Items

grow_up.description: Event to run when this entity grows up.
grow_up.title: Grow Up

interact_filters.title: Interact Filters
interact_filters.description: List of conditions to meet so that the entity can be fed.
